p: Psidium genus belongs to Myrtaceae, Myrtales order, Rosidae clade, Malvidae subclade, and comprises about 266 species with occurrence in the tropical and subtropical regions of the world. In the Americas, it extends from southern Mexico to Argentina. The centers of high diversity of Psidium species are western India, southern Brazil, Paraguay, and northern South America [ 1, 2, 3].
